description: React component for test generation interface, including UI for selecting platform/framework, managing preconditions, and displaying generated test cases and code.

methods.name: mockGenerate
methods.description: Creates a mock test generation result with sample test cases and code snippet.

methods.name: generate
methods.description: Handles test generation request, fetches data from backend or uses mock data, updates state, and shows success/error toast.

methods.name: loadPreconditions
methods.description: Loads preconditions file content from storage, updates textarea, and shows success/error toast.

methods.name: savePreconditions
methods.description: Saves current preconditions text to storage as a file, updates UI, and shows success/error toast.

methods.name: cancelPreconditions
methods.description: Closes preconditions editing UI without clearing text.
